entry.title: After the End
entry.summary:
Author: youknowwhatigetit

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,943Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: “How did I lose my virginity?” Ethan reads.“In a threesome with Aiden” Lydia and Jackson reply in unison, before turning to each other to high-five excitedly.Ethan sighs, exasperated.“We are totally going to beat all of you,” Jackson smirks at the McCall pack, still holding Lydia’s hand.“That’s not even how this game works,” Ethan says, patiently.“You’re not even on the same team,” Stiles screeches, less so. “This isn’t even a team game!”“Not my virginity,” Ethan continues, “that’s the prompt, choose your answers,” They’ve won the war - mostly. The Anuk-ite is dead. But Monroe got away, and their secret is out. And Liam is supposed to fill in Scott’s True Alpha shoes. Maybe they aren’t currently being hunted - or maybe they are? The battle happened a few hours ago.Now the McCall pack is left picking up the pieces.Or, what happens after The End.

entry.title: PROPERTY of the WOLF
entry.summary:
Author: sera9Madora

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,240Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 217

Summary: -Derek Hale was an original werewolf, he was handsome, charming, the captain of the high school lacrosse team and he was from a rich family, he was the most popular boy in beacon hills high school... Who was Stiles? No one! A nerd that no one even looked at... but Stiles knew a truth that no one knew, he knew that the world he lived in was a novel and the main character was Derek... he didn't want to get involved with the main character and his troubles, but we do not control the fate...Genre: Fantasy, Werewolf, Yaoi (BL), Romance, Mystery

entry.title: Take Care
entry.summary:
Author: ProphetofJuly

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,794Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: Stiles blinks and they’re in the car, and Derek is flouting both seat belt laws and common sense so that Stiles can lay across the bench seat with his head in Derek’s lap. Someone must have brought him a blanket because he’s not cold anymore, but he can’t seem to stop himself from shivering. Derek is stroking his hair, petting him, sort of, in a way he hasn’t really done before and it feels nice but it also makes Stiles nervous because Derek is being weird and that’s usually a bad sign.

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.
